website_summaries.verdict: A great bucket that folds flat, is made of a durable material, and performs as expected.
pros: Works in a lot of applications
Made from a durable thick silicone
A great bucket for camping or to have as a backup in your RV or boat
cons: The size on this bucket is a little smaller than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Cool little bucket
customer_reviews.text: I honestly never thought i would appreciate a rubber collapsible bucket so much. Purchased this to keep in a smaller boat. Works extremely well for throwing live bait in it and keeping close by instead of taking trips back and forth to the livewell. It worked so well that my fishing buddy stole it to use in his boat and i had to buy another. Update: It has been about a year now and it's still going strong. No rips or leaks in it, and still folds up flat and stores easy. The handle did begin to rust but that was expected being it is used only with salt water.
customer_reviews.author: FatFatallThat

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: very thick and great quality it costs a little more than some others but in this case it is only a few dollars more to get top quality so no tearing problems or stability issues well worth the money for a one time purchase
customer_reviews.author: tekwiz47

customer_reviews.title: Best bucket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bucket!! I wish there was a bigger one also! I have used this for many things and living on a boat I need items that are multipurpose and don’t take up much room! I own two!
customer_reviews.author: jaybird

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Returned it after 2 weeks after first used. Handle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: NOT for food / NOT for water
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy for food / water use Has white powder develop after several uses No idea what it is - but we bought to make giant ice cube for 5 gallon water coolers and cannot use these anymore Plus the return window closed - UGH - $75 (for 3) down the drain
customer_reviews.author: jack Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Space-Saving Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of saving space with this collapsing bucket. Really appropriate for those tight on space. Even though it collapses it is not cheaply made. Is very high quality material that I expect will last a long time. Very convenient - can take it with you anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Flg

customer_reviews.title: Good for fishing but not for camping
customer_reviews.text: Great for fishing but not for camping. The material is a little too thick making it take up too much space and it’s heavy for what it is. I was expecting it to be 1/4 the weight. That being said, it’s very durable making it perfect for putting spiny fish inside.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Sellas

customer_reviews.title: Another RV "Must Have"
customer_reviews.text: Another RV "Must Have". Gives you the options to open it to variable sizes; collapses to not even an inch, making storage a breeze; heavy duty stainless handle. We are completely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great For The RV
customer_reviews.text: I have a small 7' by 24' RV (motorhome) where space is at a premium. This bucket works for all purposes and folds flat for light and efficient storage. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Snowshoepete

customer_reviews.title: An awesome collapsible bucket
customer_reviews.text: An awesome collapsible bucket. Very soft and pliable but holds water well. Sturdy handle with a soft grip. I would not use it for tasks where you have to put your hands in like washing dishes, because it is not rigid, but for holding and transporting water or other things it's perfect. Collapses very small for storage. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Solution for storage
customer_reviews.text: Bucket is really good! What can i say, it's a bucket. But a good space saving bucket. Well made at a good price
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: In short quality is freaking terrible. Lasted about 2 folds and unfolds and hold started to develop on the sides. Now the bucket leaks like a sieve.
customer_reviews.author: Taras Tarlov

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better than this out there.
customer_reviews.text: Diameter was larger than I thought it would be - but that's a good thing! Durable so far after multiple uses and I am very happy with the purchase. I use this for my car's travel detail kit in order to do rinseless washes. The heavy, soft rubber helps keep it in place and the handle attachment points haven't degraded at all.
customer_reviews.author: HeyJudeLightning

customer_reviews.title: It’s lighweight and functions well and I love the it collapse flat for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: This collapsible bucket has been a God-send on the boat. It’s lighweight and functions well and I love the it collapse flat for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Helmuth

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad, little pricey but a nice to have collapsible ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad, little pricey but a nice to have collapsible bucket that takes up not a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: cool bucket
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cleaning up the car at shows. Folds down really well.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bucket
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bucket numerous times, to carry water, mop my trailer floor and haul small rocks. I have had no problems with it collapsing with water in it. It folds up easily enough for storage. Highly recommend for RV users.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Nissen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty space saving bucket !
customer_reviews.text: This space saving collapsible bucket is very heavy duty and user friendly. It is just as useful as a regular bucket, but does not take up valuable space. You can easily store it in a drawer or hang flat on a nail. A great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Y. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little bucket and seems to be well made not the flimsy plastic type
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping, easy to store! Took a few times to learn how to open it easily. Not too large (heavy) to use lugging water from the tap to the campsite.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Te bucket is made of really thick silicone, I used it as a mop bucket and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for saving room in your RV
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for saving room in your RV. The ones I found in stores were thin and looked very disposable. Granted this was higher priced, but buy it, Three times thicker then most.
customer_reviews.author: RBW

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little bucket
customer_reviews.text: Sweet little bucket ! So exsited when it came to the house . There durable , strong,and conventliy easy to collaps and store in a small space! Love my purchase ! One is for my garden and yard use, and the other is for the camper trailer ! They say two is better then one. And there wright!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Roelofs

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we need
customer_reviews.text: Nice structure and love that it collapses and doesn't take up space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It didn't smell of toxic chemicals and it is a bigger size than many other available. No plastic parts.
customer_reviews.author: MyExperienceWithIt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our bath to catch the extra water from waiting for shower to come to temperature. Wonderful to collapse when not in use. Sturdy when partially filled and fully filled.
customer_reviews.author: bluebox

customer_reviews.title: it's pricy but seeing as it is easily and space savingly stored
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to bucket I keep in my Airstream, it's pricy but seeing as it is easily and space savingly stored, versatile and super sturdy, I will have this forever and that makes the expense worth it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Manddun

customer_reviews.title: great house item
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS!!! great house item. I gave one to a friend and bought another for a friend. I love the heavy dutyness of it and its fold up quality. packs away nicely!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great space saver when not in use. Very happy with the size, quality and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty! Will be perfect in my limited boat storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Bucket Option
customer_reviews.text: Excellent collapsible multi-use bucket. Great to carry in the car or other places that are space restricted.
customer_reviews.author: LTC USA (RET)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use and store
customer_reviews.text: Great product that stores in a small space at our vacation home.
customer_reviews.author: Debopotamus

customer_reviews.title: Nice bucket
customer_reviews.text: I spotted theses a year or more ago and have just now been able to buy one. Perfect for our sailboat. Won't rattle, won't take up a lot of space, won't mar deck.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bucket
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is great I use it for all kinds of things. Love that it collapses. Are there bigger sizes?
customer_reviews.author: Logan 223

customer_reviews.title: I love the space saving feature of this bucket
customer_reviews.text: We are using it to catch the shower warm up water (we live in California). I love the space saving feature of this bucket! But the handle came out already when pouring out the water. But it was able to be put back in and we are just being more careful.
customer_reviews.author: V LaPaglia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket. I wish it were bigger. For the price it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: Rocquael

customer_reviews.title: It has proven to be excellent. It collapses nicely but does not collapse when ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the pail for use in our motor home. It has proven to be excellent. It collapses nicely but does not collapse when in use and unintentionally. The thickness and sturdiness of the pail is excellent. We are very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: NancyB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift so not sure but have not heard any issues.
customer_reviews.author: no expectations

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can a person fall in love with a bucket? Yes they can!
customer_reviews.author: Larry D. Robb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Does not take up much room - easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Snow

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I was looking for a collapsible bucket as I don't have a lot of storage space in my home. I bought this some months ago and it has held up very well and have had no problems with it collapsing during use. What is also nice is that I can fold it flat and put it in the dishwasher when it starts getting a little yucky or after a particularly dirty job. Would definitely order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product according to those I gave it to.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Kavanau

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I love the collapsible containers and bucket. They are exactly what I needed for my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: saadia toor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open and great for storage in a miniscule room.
customer_reviews.author: nancy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: GreatForTrips
customer_reviews.text: We took these on an airplane trip to the beach. Worked wonderfully to build sand castles! Can't wait till our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie L Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bucket for use on a boat w/ limited storage....first one that arrived was not quite right, the owner responded immediately and sent both a replacement and a shipping container & label for free return. (EXCELLENT customer service!) The new one is VERY sturdy, can be used to scoop seawater while standing on the deck, also great for holding ice & beverages, washing clothes or any of the myriad of tasks that buckets make easier. Then - viola - it folds down for easy & compact stowing!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: because other reviewers have said it collapses easily when filled
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this bucket, because other reviewers have said it collapses easily when filled. Not good, as I plan to use it for window-washing so it will always be used for liquid (and the plan is to keep it under the sink with the cleaning supplies). I am pleased to report the bucket functions exactly as it should; it expands and collapses easily but NOT at the slightest touch or when full of water. This is the perfect solution to my storage needs and I'll be purchasing at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Maize

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing to have around!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for over a year now, and it has never let us down. We use it for filling the birdbath, cleaning, sick bucket, soaking things, and it stores flat. My favorite thing? (It's silicone and what seems to be stainless steel.) I can run it through the dishwasher and have many times with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Heloise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as described, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Use it multiple times a day. Easy to fold in and out, easy to clean, portable, saves on storage. Just be careful if you bump it with your foot when filled with water as it does tip/bend in, water goes everywhere. I will still use it and quality it will last. Much better than my old icecream buckets. More sanitary, dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for a bucket but the ease of storing is great. This was one of the better qualities I ...
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for a bucket but the ease of storing is great. This was one of the better qualities I found. We have it in the camp trailer for camping needs and it works well for that.
customer_reviews.author: ijensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For The RV
customer_reviews.text: Quality collapsible bucket. I bought this to use in the RV if I need to haul water, clean something, or catch a water leak. Lightweight and easy to store, it is perfect for our RV.
customer_reviews.author: billie111

customer_reviews.title: Solved our problem
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this bucket for spreading salt in winter. Thus it is withstanding some harsh conditions. Below freezing with salt, thawing, raining, drying, sunshine, freezing again. It is holding up better than all the other buckets we've tried. It is working very well, folds up when needed, but holds its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Prime

customer_reviews.title: Designer Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool item from a design standpoint, and I think it would be really handy when camping or for around a house with a yard. The only downside is that, being collapsible, it isn't usable upside down, as a regular bucket is, and I'm not sure if it will start to collapse while standing. Not a problem if hung.
customer_reviews.author: Frances A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for compact places
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is nice, minus one star for the price but worth it I guess. Needed a compact bucket for my boat and this works. It almost collapses when you hit the top of it with a cleaning bursh or something but doesn't, which it good.
customer_reviews.author: John362

customer_reviews.title: high quality, functional bucket
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is perfect when tight storage is an issue. We got it for both camping and home use for that reason. The bucket seems to be of high quality and collapses and expands beautifully. It collapses to about the. size of a small skillet. It is plenty strong to carry a couple of gallons of water. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Primefan

customer_reviews.title: Love this bucket
customer_reviews.text: Love this bucket. This was my first purchase of a collapsible bucket. We use this for our RV for various needs such as hauling water, and storing it is just a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Great Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. Doesn't take up any space and it's very sturdy. Easy to get it unfolded and folded back up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my needs as an extra bucket. It is solid, durable, is stable as it holds water,, you can adjust the and I love that it not only folds flat but due to the "paneled" design you can customize the size bucket you need.
customer_reviews.author: Movie fan

customer_reviews.title: Solid collapsable bucket. We use this in the bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid collapsable bucket. We use this in the bathroom for washing delicates. works well. collapses and fits under the sink. saves alot of space
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love that it can be adjusted to various sizes
customer_reviews.text: Saves so much space! Absolutely love that it can be adjusted to various sizes. This is a necessity for anyone living in a small space! Wish it came in an even larger size and other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Queena Kim

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and store. A little over priced in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: lambchop

customer_reviews.title: Just bail
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's a bit small-- but then we knew that. What I don't know is how well it will hold up on the long hall. More later.
customer_reviews.author: TV Guy

customer_reviews.title: Well made takes up very little room when story
customer_reviews.text: When traveling and camping I'm limited on storage space and this is ideal well made and takes up little space when stored and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Frank Scott

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping. You can expand to 3 different sizes. Good for washing, carrying water, holding stuff. Will use this around the house too where it can be stored in very little space!

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love how this saves space in the closet. Seems substantial and durable. So glad someone designed these collapsible products!

customer_reviews.title: Great little bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Takes up little space when it's collapsed. Doesn't collapse too easily so it makes a nice little bucket. Recommend

customer_reviews.title: collapible bucket
customer_reviews.text: I just received this. this bucket is heavier than I expected can wait to use it in our camper this spring. Look like it will last for years

customer_reviews.text: Great bucket. Very sturdy. Bucket was better than I expected

customer_reviews.text: I got this bucket because there was an Amazon coupon and it was right before our camping trip. It flattens nicely and it was super useful for washing dishes.

customer_reviews.text: collapses on cue, stays up when filled and is sleek when folded.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Collapses easily! Excellent for a small space.

customer_reviews.title: Small items for small space
customer_reviews.text: seems to be sturdy when expanded. Love the way it collapses to save space in my small space. Will use this on camping trips.

customer_reviews.title: As expected, but we'll see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell how long it lasts. Unfortunately Amazon doesn't let you edit older reviews, so you'll never know. I no longer trust Amazon reviews for this reason

customer_reviews.title: Love this bucket
customer_reviews.text: Love this bucket! Perfect to pack in our Corvette so we can wash the car when we arrive at the hotel after a long road trip! My Dad loved it so much we ordered one for his Corvette too!

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket, for little spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have a little closet and this bucket fits perfect there, if you need a bucket at home and don't have much space this is the one for you. Really good quality, and it doesn't turn over or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

product_meta.title: Infusion Living Collapsible Bucket, Stainless Steel and Silicone, 2-Gallon Capacity
product_meta.description: Infusion Living Collapsible Bucket offers flexibility in cleaning tasks and toting around contents. This must-have of houseware supplies is great for cleaning and other household chores in the kitchen, bathroom, all around the house, office, and more. It's sturdy, strong and durable, yet lightweight, and won't scratch delicate surfaces. Easily adjustable to 4 different heights, it offers the perfect capacity for every task (up to a 2-gallon maximum capacity.) Once chores are done, it folds down to less than 2-inches for compact storage anywhere. Take it along for boating, camping, gardening, and fishing, or use it for washing the car or as a portable beer and wine cooler or ice bucket. Its uses are endless. Made from silicone with a stainless steel handle, it's flexible and durable, reusable and easily portable. Wipe it clean or wash in warm, soapy water when needed. Available exclusively from HIC Harold Import Co.
feature_bullets: Infusion Living Collapsible Bucket for flexibility in cleaning and toting contents
Made from silicone with stainless steel handle; sturdy, strong and durable; lightweight; won't scratch delicate surfaces
Adjusts to 4 different heights for the perfect capacity every time (holds up to 2 gallons); folds down to less than 2-inches for easy, compact storage
Take along for boating, camping, gardening, or fishing, use for washing the car, even a portable beer and wine cooler, ice bucket, and more
Reusable and easily portable; wipe clean or wash in warm, soapy water; available exclusively from HIC Harold Import Co
